attributes.additional_details: We are asking you to sign this E-Petition for every citizen of Derby to have access to a 24 hour library which will not only help the vast student population of the city but it wil create jobs for locals and gives locals a chance to broaden their literacy and computing skillls.

rejection.details: Libraries are the responsibility of the Local Council so you would need to get in touch with them.  Perhaps also contact your MP who might be able to help with a campaign?
